  9#ifndef VSIP_CORE_EXPR_TRAVERSAL_HPP
 10#define VSIP_CORE_EXPR_TRAVERSAL_HPP
 11
 12#include <vsip/core/expr/unary_block.hpp>
 13#include <vsip/core/expr/binary_block.hpp>
 14#include <vsip/core/expr/ternary_block.hpp>
 15#include <vsip/core/expr/vmmul_block.hpp>
 16
 17namespace vsip
 18{
 19namespace impl
 20{
 21template <typename B, template <typename> class E> class Component_block;
 22template <typename B> class Subset_block;
 23template <typename B> class Transposed_block;
 24template <typename B, typename O> class Permuted_block;
 25template <typename B, dimension_type D> class Sliced_block;
 26template <typename B, dimension_type D1, dimension_type D2> class Sliced2_block;
 27} // namespace vsip::impl
 28} // namespace vsip
 29
 30namespace vsip_csl
 31{
 32namespace expr
 33{
 34
 35/// Traversal traverses expression block trees,
 36/// applying the given functor to each node.
 37template <template <typename> class Functor,
 38          typename BlockType>
 39struct Traversal
 40{
 41  typedef BlockType block_type;
 42  static void apply(block_type const &b) { Functor<block_type>::apply(b);}
 43};
 44
 45template <template <typename> class Functor,
 46          typename Block, template <typename> class Extractor>
 47struct Traversal<Functor, impl::Component_block<Block, Extractor> >
 48{
 49  typedef impl::Component_block<Block, Extractor> block_type;
 50  static void apply(block_type const &block)
 51  {
 52    Traversal<Functor, Block>::apply(block.impl_block());
 53    Functor<block_type>::apply(block);
 54  }
 55};
 56template <template <typename> class Functor,
 57          typename Block> 
 58struct Traversal<Functor, impl::Subset_block<Block> >
 59{
 60  typedef impl::Subset_block<Block> block_type;
 61  static void apply(block_type const &block)
 62  {
 63    Traversal<Functor, Block>::apply(block.impl_block());
 64    Functor<block_type>::apply(block);
 65  }
 66};
 67template <template <typename> class Functor,
 68          typename Block> 
 69struct Traversal<Functor, impl::Transposed_block<Block> >
 70{
 71  typedef impl::Transposed_block<Block> block_type;
 72  static void apply(block_type const &block)
 73  {
 74    Traversal<Functor, Block>::apply(block.impl_block());
 75    Functor<block_type>::apply(block);
 76  }
 77};
 78template <template <typename> class Functor,
 79          typename Block, typename Ordering> 
 80struct Traversal<Functor, impl::Permuted_block<Block, Ordering> >
 81{
 82  typedef impl::Permuted_block<Block, Ordering> block_type;
 83  static void apply(block_type const &block)
 84  {
 85    Traversal<Functor, Block>::apply(block.impl_block());
 86    Functor<block_type>::apply(block);
 87  }
 88};
 89template <template <typename> class Functor,
 90          typename Block, dimension_type D>
 91struct Traversal<Functor, impl::Sliced_block<Block, D> >
 92{
 93  typedef impl::Sliced_block<Block, D> block_type;
 94  static void apply(block_type const &block)
 95  {
 96    Traversal<Functor, Block>::apply(block.impl_block());
 97    Functor<block_type>::apply(block);
 98  }
 99};
100template <template <typename> class Functor,
101          typename Block, dimension_type D1, dimension_type D2>
102struct Traversal<Functor, impl::Sliced2_block<Block, D1, D2> >
103{
104  typedef impl::Sliced2_block<Block, D1, D2> block_type;
105  static void apply(block_type const &block)
106  {
107    Traversal<Functor, Block>::apply(block.impl_block());
108    Functor<block_type>::apply(block);
109  }
110};
111
112template <template <typename> class Functor,
113          template <typename> class Operation,
114          typename                  Block,
115          bool                      Elementwise>
116struct Traversal<Functor, Unary<Operation, Block, Elementwise> >
117{
118  typedef Unary<Operation, Block, Elementwise> block_type;
119
120  static void apply(block_type const &block)
121  {
122    Traversal<Functor, Block>::apply(block.arg());
123    Functor<block_type>::apply(block);
124  }
125};
126
127template <template <typename> class Functor,
128          template <typename, typename> class Operation,
129          typename LBlock,
130          typename RBlock,
131	  bool Elementwise>
132struct Traversal<Functor,
133                 Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> >
134{
135  typedef Binary<Operation, LBlock, RBlock, Elementwise> block_type;
136
137  static void apply(block_type const &block)
138  {
139    Traversal<Functor, LBlock>::apply(block.arg1());
140    Traversal<Functor, RBlock>::apply(block.arg2());
141    Functor<block_type>::apply(block);
142  }
143};
144
145template <template <typename> class Functor,
146          template <typename, typename, typename> class Operation,
147          typename Block1,
148          typename Block2,
149          typename Block3,
150	  bool Elementwise>
151struct Traversal<Functor,
152                 Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, Elementwise> >
153{
154  typedef Ternary<Operation, Block1, Block2, Block3, Elementwise> block_type;
155
156  static void apply(block_type const &block)
157  {
158    Traversal<Functor, Block1>::apply(block.arg1());
159    Traversal<Functor, Block2>::apply(block.arg2());
160    Traversal<Functor, Block3>::apply(block.arg3());
161    Functor<block_type>::apply(block);
162  }
163};
164
165template <template <typename> class Functor,
166          dimension_type D,
167          typename       VectorBlock,
168          typename       MatrixBlock>
169struct Traversal<Functor,
170                 expr::Vmmul<D, VectorBlock, MatrixBlock> >
171{
172  typedef expr::Vmmul<D, VectorBlock, MatrixBlock> block_type;
173
174  static void apply(block_type const& block)
175  {
176    Traversal<Functor, VectorBlock>::apply(block.get_vblk());
177    Traversal<Functor, MatrixBlock>::apply(block.get_mblk());
178    Functor<block_type>::apply(block);
179  }
180};
181
182} // namespace vsip_csl::expr
183} // namespace vsip_csl
184
185#endif
